mapper.select: SELECT A.CENTER_ID -- 센터 id , A.CENTER_NM -- 센터명 , A.CENTER_LOCATION -- 센터위치 , A.HOSPITAL_CD -- 병원코드 , B.DETAIL_CD_NM AS HOSPITAL_NM -- 병원명 , A.USE_YN -- 사용여부 , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DT , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DT FROM TREATMENT_CENTER A LEFT JOIN COM_CD_DETAIL B ON B.COM_CD = 'CD002' AND B.DETAIL_CD = A.HOSPITAL_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CENTER_ID = #{centerId}

SELECT A.CENTER_ID -- 센터 id , A.CENTER_NM -- 센터명 , A.CENTER_LOCATION -- 센터위치 , A.HOSPITAL_CD -- 병원코드 , B.DETAIL_CD_NM AS HOSPITAL_NM -- 병원명 , A.USE_YN -- 사용여부 , A.REG_ID , A.REG_DT , A.UPD_ID , A.UPD_DT FROM TREATMENT_CENTER A LEFT JOIN COM_CD_DETAIL B ON B.COM_CD = 'CD002' AND B.DETAIL_CD = A.HOSPITAL_CD WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.CENTER_ID = #{centerId}
AND A.CENTER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{centerNm}, '%')
AND B.DETAIL_CD_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{hospitalNm}, '%')
ORDER BY A.CENTER_ID
mapper.update: UPDATE TREATMENT_CENTER SET CENTER_NM = #{centerNm} -- 센터명 , CENTER_LOCATION = #{centerLocation} -- 센터위치 , HOSPITAL_CD = #{hospitalCd} -- 병원코드 , UPD_ID = #{updId} -- 수정자 , UPD_DT = NOW() -- 수정일시 WHERE CENTER_ID = #{centerId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE TREATMENT_CENTER SET USE_YN = 'N' , UPD_ID = #{updId} , UPD_DT = NOW() WHERE CENTER_ID = #{centerId} -- 센터Id
